title: 指定菸品健康風險評估審查收費標準
title_en: Fee-charging Standard for the Health Risk Assessment Review of Designated Tobacco Products
short_name: Fee-charging Standard for the Health Risk Assessment Review of Designated Tobacc
description: Official legislation text from Taiwan Laws & Regulations Database. Category: 行政＞衛生福利部＞國民健康目. Articles extracted: 3.

provisions.title: 第 1 條
provisions.content: 本標準依規費法第十條規定訂定之。

provisions.title: 第 2 條
provisions.content: 業者申請指定菸品健康風險評估審查，每件應繳納審查費，新臺幣二百萬元。
